name: Toy Tactics (Ethan Kapelka | Game Dev)
description:
Stop the toys before they escape! Toy Tactics - VR Game

Toy Tactics is an action game where you play as an overnight security guard at a toy store. But at night, the toys come alive and try to escape through the front doors! Stop the living toys from escaping or risk losing your pay or your job!

Credits: Brian Bauch Sean Devlin Jose Estrada Eleanore Falck Kali Gardner Nate Geshwill Jon Gilleland Ethan Kapelka Harrison Kelly Zack Olson Adrianna Thiele Created for the August 2022 Wowie Jam 4.0 Created on Quest 2 VR
